description: A versatile 3-in-1 jacket with an outer shell and insulated inner layer that can be worn separately or together.  Waterproof-breathable construction keeps moisture out while thermal-reflective linings keep heat in. Ski-friendly features include multifunctional pockets, powder skirt, and adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem.
name: Columbia Sportswear Powder Canyon Interchange II Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 80g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
60g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
